properties.name: open
properties.doc:
If True, this pane is visible on the page.
If False, the pane is hidden.

properties.name: on_close
properties.doc:
The name of a function that is be triggered when this pane is closed (if the user clicks outside of it or presses the Esc key). All parameters of that function are optional:
  • state (State^): the state instance.
  • id (optional[str]): the identifier of the button.
  • action (optional[str]): the name of the action that provoked the change.
If this property is not set, no function is called when this pane is closed.

properties.name: anchor
properties.doc:
Anchor side of the pane.
Valid values are "left", "right", "top", or "bottom".

properties.name: width
properties.doc: Width, in CSS units, of this pane. This is used only if anchor is "left" or "right".

properties.name: height
properties.doc: Height, in CSS units, of this pane. This is used only if anchor is "top" or "bottom".

properties.name: persistent
properties.doc:
If True, the pane appears next to the page.
If False, the pane covers the page where it appeared.
